Hi Frank
I agree with you as far as picking up the energy of those around f=
ocusing, It was really hard to tell. For years I have experienced a wave of=
 nausea around a variety of energy feilds. I felt light headed and nausea a=
round Bill's box. Now this might be silly and/or psychosymatic but when I l=
isten to the files posted (from my comp) on this site, of the box EVP's, I =
feel a nausea as well. I am thinking it is more likely a manifestation in m=
y mind, but then again I rule nothing out, just make note! Again I am a ske=
ptic by nature but not because I do not want to believe. I personally seek =
truth even when it is not in my liking, perhaps because I want so much to b=
elieve. Im sure many of us here can relate. Another thing about my first ex=
perience with the box was, Bill asked if there was any one in the room it w=
anted to communicate too? It said Tina   Maria (twice I heard it), and anot=
her person's name that was present in the room, it also kept calling Bill t=
he
 owners name. I never opened my mouth the whole time. I felt that to man=
y people in the room were talking at the box and to each other, which "almo=
st"??? seemed to render it in effective. I personally think that we do not =
need to ask it any questions or call upon any specific spirit etc... for it=
 to communicate. What is there will utilize the white noise and expose itse=
lf. I am very new to this and do not claim to know much.....but I certainly=
 feel this box is in its pioneer stage of something credible. Thanx for you=
r thoughts Frank. How do I get a box made? Im sure you have posted it somew=
here, and I am too new to do it myself at this time.
Tinamarie



----- Ori=
ginal Message ----
From: Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...>
To: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, July 21, 2007 7:40:17 PM
Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC

Thanks Tinamarie;

I wonder if y=
ou could pcik up on the energy they supposedly focused on the 
box? That's =
something I'm skeptical about, as the box builder. I don't think 
it's need=
ed. When I do my sessions I ask no questions, and don't ask for any 
partic=
ular spirit. I like to leave it open, and all enetities are welcome. I 
don=
't want to set up expectations, or limitations, but..that's only my way 
of=
 running it.

Did you hear anything out of the box?

Frank-S

>Hi To All
>I=
 have been listening to every posted file, and there are several that are 
=
>so distinct. This one is one of them! Very nice, very interesting, 
>defin=
atley something happening! I am fixin to get my own and start as well. 
>I =
got to witness the box belonging to Bill Murphy at a Paranormal Meetup 
>gr=
oup. This was the first time I had seen such a thing and to be honest at 
>=
first was a bit skeptical, even though I strongly believe and feel have 
>c=
ollected much credible evidence of paranormal activity for many years now. =

>I have come to conclude that I am extremely sensitive to energies as well=
 
>as extremely intuitive. The box has a definate energy about it. I contin=
ue 
>to read everything thats posted and listen in hope to grasp this whole=
 
>concept. I cant get it out of my mind. How amazing this form of EVP is. =

>Good job to all, hopefully I will be able to contribute some time soon. Y=
ou 
>know years ago my kids had Furbies (sp?), and they would just start ta=
lking 
>out of no
> where and say very revelent things that I felt was stra=
nge at the time 
>and out of context to anything my kids said....LOL, I won=
der if there is 
>any connection. Maybe not but I never forget them, Frank'=
s Box conjures up 
>the same energy to me.
>Tinamarie Sexton (gypsyharlot11=
11)
>Tinamarie
